problems.title: Number Triangle Pattern 1
problems.description:
Write a program to print a number triangle pattern of height n.

Input Format:
A single integer n.

Output Format:
Print the pattern as shown in the examples.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
3

Sample Output
1
12
123

Explanation:
Numbers from 1 to row number are printed.
hintsList: Inner loop prints numbers from 1 to current row index.
